description: Enjoy a scenic 120-minute bike ride along the Aasee lake, taking in the beautiful landscape and peaceful surroundings.

locationInfo.description: Aasee offers a peaceful environment for cycling with lake views and green paths. A relaxing and scenic route.

description: Take a guided walking tour around Schloss Münster, exploring the historical architecture and beautiful gardens surrounding the castle.

locationInfo.description: Schloss Münster is a historic palace with a stunning garden. A perfect place to wander and soak in Münster’s history.
safetyTips: Be cautious of uneven surfaces in the garden.
Respect any areas that may be restricted.

description: Spend 120-150 minutes exploring the Allwetterzoo Münster, where you can see a variety of animals and enjoy a lovely walk around the zoo.

locationInfo.description: Allwetterzoo offers both indoor and outdoor animal exhibits, making it a perfect place to explore on a warm day.
safetyTips: Stay on marked paths to avoid disturbing the animals.
Be mindful of the weather and stay hydrated.

description: Walk through the Botanical Garden at the University of Münster and discover the diverse plant species while enjoying the pleasant weather.

locationInfo.description: The Botanical Garden provides a peaceful escape with its lush greenery, exotic plants, and tranquil walking paths.
safetyTips: Keep an eye on your belongings in the open areas.

description: Rent a kayak and paddle around Aasee for a relaxing and fun 120-minute water adventure, enjoying the calm lake and the view of the city.

locationInfo.description: Kayaking on Aasee provides a great opportunity to enjoy both the water and the landscape, making it an ideal solo adventure.
safetyTips: Wear a life jacket at all times.
Check the weather before kayaking to ensure safety.
